long_description: The loveable Curious George and the Man with the Yellow Hat explore recycling and other green themes in. Authors: Monica Perez with illustrations by Anna Grossnickle Hines in the style of the original illustrators. Softcover; 24 pages; color illustrations. Houghton Mifflin Co.; copyright 2009. Includes a plantable bookmark that helps your child grow his or her own flowers.
short_description: The loveable Curious George and the Man with the Yellow Hat explore recycling and other green themes in Curious George Plants a Tree .
